Title: Enacts a moratorium on the closure of hospitals
Summary: Institutes a moratorium on the closure of hospitals until the department of health completes a comprehensive analysis and report on the impact of such closures on healthcare access in New York state.
LawCode: Add ยง2831, Pub Health L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the public health law, in relation to instituting a moratorium on the closure of hospitals until the department of health completes a comprehensive analysis of the impact of such closures on healthcare access in New York state
